state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled bell pepper. -= Bedroom =- Ah, the bedroom. This is some kind of bedroom, really great normal vibes in this place, a wonderful normal atmosphere. You can barely contain your excitement. You can make out a closed chest drawer in the room. You can see a closed antique trunk nearby. You make out a king-size bed. The king-size bed is normal. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
You open the antique trunk, revealing an old key. > -= Bedroom =-0/2
admissible_commands: take old key from antique trunk
optimal_action: take old key from antique trunk

state: You take the old key from the antique trunk. > -= Bedroom =-0/3
admissible_commands: insert old key into antique trunk
put old key on king-size bed
unlock wooden door with old key
optimal_action: unlock wooden door with old key

lock wooden door with old key

insert old key into antique trunk
put old key on king-size bed

state: -= Kitchen =- You are in a kitchen. It seems to be pretty usual here. Were you looking for a refrigerator? Because look over there, it's a refrigerator. You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a counter. The counter appears to be empty. You scan the room, seeing a stove. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You can see a kitchen island. The kitchen island is typical. On the kitchen island you make out a note. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it. There is a closed screen door leading east. There is an open wooden door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-1/6
admissible_commands: put old key on kitchen island

state: You open screen door. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-2/7
admissible_commands: put old key on kitchen island

state: -= Backyard =- You've just shown up in a backyard. You can see a set of chairs. However, the set of chairs, like an empty set of chairs, has nothing on it. You move on, clearly done caring about TextWorld. You can make out a bbq. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You can see a patio table. The patio table is typical. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it? There is an open screen door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Backyard =-2/8
admissible_commands: put old key on patio table
put old key on set of chairs
